Literature.Title: Synergistic Antipseudomonal Effects of Synthetic Peptide AMP38 and Carbapenems.
Literature.Author: Rudilla H, Fusté E, Cajal Y, Rabanal F, Vinuesa T, Viñas M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA116136(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 536SJD(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=0.5-4µg/ml)
